trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Elkview
There were no other sightings in Elkview on or around March 11th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsTuesday 03-11-2008 - Traveling north on I-79 near mile marker 7 at 9:12pm, it was a clear night, stars were visible. I noticed a UFO traveling south parallel to I-79 with 8 bright lights arranged in a V shape. The bright lights caught my attention. It was not heading directly at me, but, parallel to the highway. It appeared to be no more than 1000ft in altitude, but, that's a guess. I was traveling at approx 72mph on cruise control. The lights had an odd alignment to them, I would expect that 8 lights across, on a V shape, leaving 4 on each leg of the V, to be a straight line, but, counting from the tip of the V as #1 light and #4 being near the center, light #3 appeared to be lower than #2 and #4. None of these lights were flashing, nor were there any flashing lights at all, no red, no green, just white. The size reminded me of a 747 or 757 with the wingspan seeming to be quite large. I watched as much as possible but did not stop to view the object. It remained in the low slow path until it disappeared from my view as I drove north. Approximately 2 miles later I spotted a small single engine plane flying in the same direction with red and green flashing lights as I would expect and appeared in a normal fashion. This small plane must have been able to spot the object as it wasn't that far behind and in the same apparent flight path.
Summary: Low slow flying V-shape with 8 lights none blinking no sound
